S.54
Latest Title: Stop Illegal Trafficking in Firearms Act of 2013
Sponsor: Sen Leahy, Patrick J. [VT] (introduced 1/22/2013)      Cosponsors (2)
Latest Major Action: 2/12/2013 Senate committee/subcommittee actions. Status: Committee on the Judiciary Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights and Human Rights. Hearings held.
Jump to: Summary, Major Actions, All Actions, Titles, Cosponsors, Committees, Related Bill Details, Amendments
SUMMARY:

***NONE***

MAJOR ACTIONS:

***NONE***

ALL ACTIONS:
1/22/2013:
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S180)
1/22/2013:
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
2/12/2013:
Committee on the Judiciary Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights and Human Rights. Hearings held.
TITLE(S):  (italics indicate a title for a portion of a bill)

  • SHORT TITLE(S) AS INTRODUCED:
    Stop Illegal Trafficking in Firearms Act of 2013

  • OFFICIAL TITLE AS INTRODUCED:
    A bill to increase public safety by punishing and deterring firearms trafficking.
COSPONSORS(2), ALPHABETICAL [followed by Cosponsors withdrawn]:     (Sort: by date)

Sen Blumenthal, Richard [CT] - 2/7/2013
